entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-24070: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #348
  • .NET March 2025 Updates #347

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Input binding is not supported well with Shadow DOM elements #60885
  • Perf improvement: json #60877
  • Quarantine EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation #60875
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #60873
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-24070: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #60871
  • Custom generator for sessionKey in SessionMiddleware #60869
  • [Blazor] Blazor Web App with multiple secure API not working with OIDC #60868
  • Generated OpenAPI docs overrides [Consumes] attribute through [FromForm] #60867
  • [Bug] Conditional attribute rendering #60864
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #60862
  • File(stream, ...) does not dispose the stream #60860

Closed

  • update project templates use primary constructors #52893
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Need to install Windows Hosting Bundle using dotnet-install.ps1 script #60191
  • [Infrastructure] error : Generate SBOM manifest (alpine319WithNode) #60108
  • [Blazor] JS assets in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements` are not getting included #60859
  • Reconnection UI doesn't display if Blazor Web App is globally interactive #60866
  • "dotnet new webapiaot" should include OpenAPI support #59564
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Description parameter of ProducesResponseTypeAttribute does not work in minimal API app #60518
    Backlog
  • JsonSerializerContext can't have mutliple dtos with the same name #60863
  • [Blazor] Static SSR - [SupplyParameterFromForm] parameter null on empty form data (eg. unchecked InputCheckbox) #60837
  • Blazor Web App takes a long time to shut down when pressing Ctrl-C #60815
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #60833
  • Perf improvement: httpsys-hostheader-mismatch #60826
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60855
  • Class library projects are added as assembly: ApplicationPart in razor application assembly #60648
  • An invalid reference is generated for a object that contains two properties of type List<List<string>> (both of the same type). #60381
  • Fix self-referential schema handling for collection-based types #60339
    9.0.x
  • [10.0-preview.1] ASP.NET `RouteHandlerAnalyzer` - `System.IndexOutOfRangeException` #60719
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix ResponseCompressionMiddleware tests #60884
    area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • Quarantine EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation #60876
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2660536 #60872
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update project templates use primary constructors and collection expressions #59712
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #60879
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.15
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #60880
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.4
  • [release/2.3] Merge from internal #60878
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Delete SignalR ts client #60882
    area-signalr
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm test #60874
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix apostrophes in ReconnectModal.razor.js #60816
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Fix custom elements JS assets not being included in build output #60858
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.4
  • Add more schema tests #60822
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix self-referential schema handling in collection schemas #60410
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.4
  • Check length of TypeArguments before accessing via index #60742
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Support for declaratively persisting component and services state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Add SignalR client log for stream item binding failure #60857
    area-signalr
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fix IIS recycle regressions #59998
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Need to add new XML documentation tag to support C# primary constructors #9206

Updated

  • Optimize temporary string usage when DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler is used #9207

PullRequests

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: fix links #9193
  • Add proposal for ignored directives #9192
  • Extensions: adjust rules for `[Extension]` attribute #9205

Updated

  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move off of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.{Analyzer,CodeFix}.Testing.XUnit #35768
    Backlog
  • "ef dbcontext optimize --nativeaot" generates uncompilable code for arrays of enums #35767

Closed

  • Upgrade Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* package versions to 4.13.0 #34637
    10.0.0
  • SaveChanges throws exception when SetValues is used and a child object exists in change tracker #35745
  • SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT ON by default #35756

PullRequests

Created

  • Targeted fix for #35162 - Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: MigrationBuilder.DropTable Causes Issues with Subsequent Table Recreation #35764
  • Fix to #35299 - EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35763

Merged

  • Depend on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.13.0 #35753

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35772
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35769
  • Navigation test refactoring - improving structure for scenarios that don't support collections #35711
  • Redact constants that get inlined from variables into query in log #35724
  • Fix to #21006 - Support a default value for non-nullable properties #35746

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stepper allows the value to increment past max when min, max, value set to 1. #28330
  • Bump CommunityToolkit/SF on IncludeSampleContent template #28324
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Setting the background property of Picker/Spinner in a handler mapping does not work for .net 8 #28317
  • Hot Reload and Live Preview won't work if the configuration is not called Debug #28316
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation #28303
  • Delay in Hiding Custom Busy Indicator Animation During Page Navigation in .NET MAUI. #28300
  • [iOS, Border] Border with a inner image doesn't animate right #28296

Closed

  • CollectionView inside invisible StackLayout doesn't show on iOS #28263
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #7156
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Using Maui controls and layout in blazor #28252
  • CarouselView content calls SizeChanged forever with certain parent view/display resolution combinations #22363
    Backlog
  • "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property, and doesn't display a preview in the XAML editor #21325
    Backlog
  • [testing] Run Android device tests on Windows #25570
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Catalyst Device Tests are broken from [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28285
    .NET 9 SR5
  • The fonts are italic when uninstall the app with installshield #28295
  • When creating a new project, it always gets stuck displaying the message: "Xcode: Checking the environment." #28299
  • Today, we are excited to announce the first preview release of .NET 10! We just shipped our **first** preview release, adding to some major enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today. #28297
  • Scrollview with ScrollView VerticalOptions="Center" not growing to fit contents on iOS #23084
  • MAUI Swipe view items looks weird on iOS #21329

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28328
    area-testing, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Obsolete TableView #28327
  • [ci] Fix provisionator #28325
  • What if we did not use dictionaries? #28322
  • [Android] CV RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load - fix #28321
    community ✨
  • Fix for Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #28315
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28312
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Align the Sender between the gestures when emit the events #28305
    area-gestures
  • Obsolete TableView #28302
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview2

Merged

  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update Versions.props to .NET 9 SR6 #28326
  • Mark MapReload from PickerHandler Obsolete #28028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28313
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Remove mobile librarybuilder net9 #28290
    area-infrastructure, dependencies, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update Versions.props for .NET 9 SR5 Servicing #28320
  • Disable test recently re-enabled BindingUpdatesFromInteractiveRefresh #28314
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28286
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28269
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update sdk and runtime #28307
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
    .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Fix Numeric Entry not accepting the appropriate Decimal Separator #27376
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS & Android] Fix: RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing. #28164
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3

    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix the ListView scroll position center and end without animation #27001
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Picker Items are not Displaying on macOS platform #27535
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Button rendering overflow in StackLayout #28001
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6

  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Go to definition" on instantiation of source type navigates to implicit operator of target type when instantiation emits error #77545
  • Correctness_Determinism failure due to path in .resx file #77544
  • Used assemblies not tracked when binding extension methods without arguments #77542
  • Some attributes are not synthesized for extended partial methods #77529
  • `readonly ref` and `in` parameters removes warning CS0649: Field 'field' was never assigned to. #77528
  • Tooling to validate dependency restrictions, that Visual Studio imposes on Roslyn tools. #77527
  • Behavior of Edit.WordDeleteToEnd on single-line C# comment has changed #77523

Closed

  • `for` loop with multiple uninitialized variables no longer compiles #77160
    17.13
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.13.0 causes build error Error CS0234 : The type or namespace name .. does not exist in the namespace .. (are you missing an assembly reference?) #77472
  • VB SymbolDisplayVisitor.AddMethodName throws InvalidOperationException when formatting C# destructor ISymbol #77459
  • vs 2022 17.13.0 Roslyn ISourceGenerator do not have new line after nullable enable like this '#nullable enableusing System;' #77376
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35911.15 #77522
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35910.77 #77514

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Make sure ExtensionMethodReferenceRewriter rewrites all the "interesting" method references. #77540
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add CI validation of Semantic Search API lists #77535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support inference in collection expressions #77534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Handle explicit type arguments #77532
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Stack Trace Explorer for additional documents #77517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable downloading the runtime packages during restore and instead ensure that it happens when needed (pack) #77515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add runtime async to official build #77537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix issue with 'null conditional assignment' and 'generate variable' #77524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support generate method in null-conditional-assignment #77526
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77530
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Clean up implementation of SourceMethodSymbol.AddSynthesizedAttributes after merge from 'main' #77509
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Mark partial events and ctors as complete #77525
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add completion validation tests #77511
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Share Copilot doc comment option for C# and C++ #77550
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Extensions: Handle lowering for collection initializers #77549
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add IsAvailable to ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProviderImpl #77548
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NFW due to invoking Workspace.RaiseEventForHandlers in the CA process #77546
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add note for issue 51692 to source generator cookbooks #76818
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Show analysis status in task status center instead of status bar #77496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix run code analysis on solution not reporting results #77501
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hang with `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering = false` in .NET 9 #113398
  • [API Proposal]: Allow me to bring my own HttpClient implementations #113395
  • JIT: pgostress hitting assert in vector division #113393
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow using `StringComparer` at `GetKeyedService` #113386
  • Deadlock under debugger #113373
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] No nightly stress runs for old versions #113372
    10.0.0
  • New "terminate called after throwing an instance of 'PAL_SEHException'" error with legacy EH enabled #113370
  • Exception in clrjit.dll when using .NET 9.0 #113369
  • Continued Issue with System.Memory 4.6.0 and NUnit in .NET Framework 4.7.2 #113368
  • With Faster Exceptions, exceptions thrown in some out-of-process COM calls raise AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException #113367
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 3/8/2025 12:17:48 AM +00:00 #113378
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 5 Regressions on 3/6/2025 2:14:44 PM +00:00 #113379
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/3/2025 9:01:29 PM +00:00 #113380
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: System.IO.Tests.BinaryWriterTests Regression on 3/8/2025 7:47:21 PM +00:00 #113382
  • [API Proposal]: Type Mapping API #113362
    10.0.0
  • `Type.Equals(Type)` is not consistent with `Type.Equals(object)` when using modified types #113361
  • When type discriminator on a polymorphic type is also a property on the base type it is emitted twice into the resulting string #113358
  • LoongArch: LSX/LASX usage in CoreCLR #113354
  • MetadataLoadContext assembly binding behavior is documented incorrectly #113353
  • HashHelpers.FastMod could use Bmi2.X64.MultiplyNoFlags(ulong, ulong) directly #113352

Closed

  • Polymorphic types are failing to emit type discriminator field when serializing the derived type #113357
  • [Native AOT] Initialize COM eagerly #113040

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP][swift] Use of TBD files to retrieve symbols missing from abi.json #3034
    * NO MERGE *, area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Some VM cleanups, TODOs, renames and better comments. #3032
    area-async

Updated

    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `UseWindowsForms` causes token `Windows` to be clobbered in global scope. #39299
  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • RHEL9: missing dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0-8.0.8 #43009
  • Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset download check fails because NuGetPackageRoot is unset in some scenarios #43016
  • Workloads are broken on Fedora 40 #44082
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]With 9.0.104 SDK installed on win-x64, Warning "The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.102.1' displays when switch back to loose manifests if workload set version is "9.0.102.1" #46946
  • File conflict when pack packages on Github Actions dotnet 10 preview 1 sdk #47269

Updated

  • Unable to install published 8.0 and 9.0 project using setup #47344
  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Unable to find directory for jdk 11.0.24; please make sure the tool is installed on this image. #45834
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006

  • Unable to use `dotnet sln add` to add an esproj to a solution #36617
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Allow setting projects meant to only be used to not compile code as Non applicable for building. #15408
    Discussion
  • "dotnet restore" and "dotnet publish" use relative BaseIntermediateOutputPath even if it's set to absolute path #46990
  • dotnet watch crashes with "An unexpected error ocurred" #47392
  • Publishing native AOT fails on Fedora 40, Documentation suggests packages only for Ubuntu #42335
  • A combination of dotnet build and dotnet publish --no-build -p:PublishSingleFile=true does not work in .net8.0 #37367
  • PublishContainer + GeneratePackageOnBuild results in race #47429
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 10 preview 2 SDK installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #47129
    10.0.1xx
  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #47227
  • GenerateToolsSettingsFile causes incremental build issues #17454
    10.0.1xx
  • Encoded plus sign in image mediaType for container publish #47399
  • PrivateAssets="All" breaks Android apps #47332
  • Change in argument handling in `dotnet run` between 9.0.103 and 9.0.200 #46912
  • dotnet tool restore started failing on macOS with NU3037 and NU3028 errors after 11th February #46857
    9.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created
